short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Enhance your use of the Kameleoon WYSIWYG editor with the Kameleoon Graphical Editor extension.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Enhance your utilization of the Kameleoon WYSIWYG editor with the Kameleoon Graphical Editor extension, especially in scenarios where:
- Your website restricts the usage of an iframe.
- Your website displays a mobile version based on the user agent. 

Kameleoon empowers brands to build better products and digital experiences. It is the only optimization solution with Web Experimentation, Feature Experimentation, and AI-Driven Personalization capabilities in a single unified platform.
